description: WinSSHTerm is a tabbed SSH solution for Windows, combining PuTTY, WinSCP and VcXsrv. It helps you to be more productive. Using keyboard shortcuts and intelligent navigation tools allows you to quickly switch between or start new SSH sessions even if you have to manage many systems. It has built-in support for copying files and running X applications. The terminal colors are carefully selected to minimize the stress for your eyes.
summary: WinSSHTerm is a tabbed SSH solution for Windows, combining PuTTY, WinSCP and VcXsrv.
author: P-St Software
